EmailTemplate.name: TIDS_VB_Rejected_Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your TIDS Virtual Branch Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TIDS Application Not Accepted
Dear {!Contact.Name},
We have reviewed your application for a TIDS Virtual Branch under Case Number {!Case.CaseNumber}.
We regret to advise that we are unable to proceed with your application at this time.
Below are details concerning the reason for disapproval: {!Case.Last_Case_Comment}
Should you have any questions, please contact us via the IATA Customer Portal
Thank you for choosing TIDS, IATA's program for standard identification of non-accredited travel sellers.
The IATA TIDS Team
This email was sent to {!Contact.Email}. Please do not reply to this email as this address is not monitored. International Air Transport Association. 800 Square Victoria, Montreal, H4Z 1M1, Canada Â© Copyright 2020. All rights reserved. https://www.iata.org
